meanings.definition: The act or process of organizing or arranging something in a structured way.
meanings.sent1: The structuralizations of the event venue made it easy for guests to navigate.
meanings.sent2: The structuralizations of the bookshelves helped keep the library tidy.
meanings.sent3: The structuralizations of the picnic blankets turned into a fun game of hopscotch.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a whirlwind of colorful structuralizations, each idea neatly categorized.
meanings.sent5: The structuralizations of the Lego pieces made it simple for the child to build a castle.

meanings.definition: The result of giving a definite form or organization to something.
meanings.sent1: The structuralizations of the project plan ensured a smooth execution.
meanings.sent2: The structuralizations of the data led to clear and concise reports.
meanings.sent3: The structuralizations of the garden beds resembled a carefully crafted puzzle.
meanings.sent4: His speech was a beautiful structuralizations of thoughts and emotions.
meanings.sent5: The structuralizations of the city skyline were a testament to urban planning.
